channel.title: Ryan Glover: From Freelancer to Entrepreneur with Meteor
channel.description:
I just sat down for an interview with @rglover from [Proper][1], an app that helps freelancer set up good contracts. Like many of us, he's trying to transition from freelancer to entrepreneur, and I think he's doing an awesome job so far!
Anyway let me know what you think:
[Ryan Glover: From Freelancer to Entrepreneur with Meteor][2]
[1]: http://properapp.com [2]: https://www.discovermeteor.com/2014/01/23/ryan-glover-from-freelancer-to-entrepreneur-with-meteor/
